name: EVENT
documentation: Defines the abstract notion of a single event in a series. This class is generic, allowing types to be generated which are locked to particular spatial types, such as `EVENT<ITEM_LIST>`. Subtypes express point or intveral data.

time.name: time
time.documentation: Time of this event. If the width is non-zero, it is the time point of the trailing edge of the event.

state.name: state
state.documentation: Optional state data for this event.

offset.name: offset
offset.documentation: Offset of this event from origin, computed as time.diff(parent.origin).

invariants.Offset_validity1: offset /= Void and then offset = time.diff (parent.origin)
